title: Get this Pyrex Cook & Freeze bundle for just £19.99
content:
Whether you want to rustle up delicious midweek meals in a hurry or simply keep costs down, batch cooking is the way to go. And now, you can make the process even easier with the Pyrex Cook & Freeze bundle. Made with heat-resistant borosilicate and designed to withstand a thermal shock of 220°C, the set contains three round glass containers that allow you to move from freezer to oven – and back again – safely, along with the Pyrex Classic Bake & Enjoy Tray, so you can serve up your creations in style. With this exclusive deal, you can get your hands on this incredible set for a pocket-friendly £19.99, plus £2.95 for standard delivery or £4.50 for fast delivery.

Claim your offer

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Ready to transform the way you cook with this fantastic Pyrex set? Here are just some of the impressive features you’re sure to love…

Pyrex Cook & Freeze Round Containers, Set of three:

  • Supports extreme temperatures from -40°C to 300°C
  • Smart and BPA free lids for storing in the fridge/freezer
  • Nestable and stackable
  • Scratch-resistant
  • Food safe

Pyrex Classic Bake & Enjoy Tray:

  • Microwave safe
  • Dishwasher safe
  • Freezer safe
  • Oven safe up to 300°C
  • Thermal shock up to 220°C
  • 100% food safe
  • L32cm x W26cm x H3cm

Offer ends 19/05/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

author: Steve Newell
